verses.name: Numbers 2:30
verses.text: And his host, and those that were numbered of them, were fifty and three thousand and four hundred.

verses.name: Numbers 2:31
verses.text: All they that were numbered in the camp of Dan were an hundred thousand and fifty and seven thousand and six hundred. They shall go hindmost with their standards.

verses.name: Numbers 2:32
verses.text: These are those which were numbered of the children of Israel by the house of their fathers: all those that were numbered of the camps throughout their hosts were six hundred thousand and three thousand and five hundred and fifty.
